name: Active Scheduler Suite
short_description:
Active scheduler has been created for two major reasons:

Educational: You will find things like the Use cases, Process modeling diagrams, etc.. that normally don't find on open software these days.

Functional: Active Scheduler helps in event planning by giving volunteers the chance of "Actively scheduling" themselves based on certain event needs. This is especially complicated when scheduling different ministries in Churches.

Active Scheduler Suite, aims to become a full system that can be downloaded and distributed to Churches, including a Database server, a Web Server, Web Application and Mobile Application.
summary: Active Scheduler Suite aids in scheduling Church volunteers for events
